name: xpr_report.report_saleorder
src: Sales taxes applicable in the dealership's province will be included in the invoice.
value: Les taxes de ventes applicables à la province du concessionnaire seront incluses à la facturation.

name: res.company,rml_footer
src: Phone: 1 866 370-1411 | Fax: 450 681-1203 | Email: support@evolio.ca | Website: http://www.evolio.ca/
column7: Phone: 1 866 370-1411 | Fax: 450 681-1203 | Email: support@evolio.ca | Website: http://www.evolio.ca/
column10: Tél: 1 866 370-1411 | Fax: 450 681-1203 | Courriel: support@evolio.ca | Site web: http://www.evolio.ca/

name: res.company,rml_header
src: <header>     <pageTemplate>         <frame id="first" x1="1.3cm" y1="3.0cm" height="20cm" width="19.0cm"/>          <stylesheet>             <!-- Set here the default font to use for all <para> tags -->             <paraStyle name='Normal' fontName="DejaVuSans"/>             <paraStyle name="main_footer" fontSize="8.0" alignment="CENTER"/>             <paraStyle name="main_header" fontSize="8.0" leading="10" alignment="LEFT" spaceBefore="0.0" spaceAfter="0.0"/>          </stylesheet>         <pageGraphics>             <!-- Set here the default font to use for all <drawString> tags -->             <setFont name="DejaVuSans" size="8"/>             <!-- You Logo - Change X,Y,Width and Height -->             <image x="1.3cm" y="26.0cm" height="40.0" >[[ company.logo or removeParentNode('image') ]]</image>             <fill color="black"/>             <stroke color="black"/>              <!-- page header -->             <lines>1.3cm 26.0cm 20cm 26.0cm</lines>             <drawRightString x="20cm" y="26.1cm">[[ company.rml_header1 ]]</drawRightString>             <drawString x="1.3cm" y="25.6cm">[[ company.partner_id.name ]]</drawString>             <place x="1.3cm" y="23.6cm" height="1.8cm" width="15.0cm">                 <para style="main_header">[[ display_address(company.partner_id) or  '' ]]</para>             </place>             <drawString x="1.3cm" y="23.3cm">Phone:</drawString>             <drawRightString x="7cm" y="23.3cm">[[ company.partner_id.phone or '' ]]</drawRightString>             <drawString x="1.3cm" y="22.9cm">Mail:</drawString>             <drawRightString x="7cm" y="22.9cm">[[ company.partner_id.email or '' ]]</drawRightString>             <lines>1.3cm 22.8cm 7cm 22.8cm</lines>              <!-- left margin -->             <rotate degrees="90"/>             <fill color="grey"/>             <drawString x="2.65cm" y="-0.4cm">generated by Odoo.com</drawString>             <fill color="black"/>             <rotate degrees="-90"/>              <!--page bottom-->             <place x="1.3cm" y="0.7cm" height="2.55cm" width="19.0cm">                   <para>Account consultant initials _____ Client initials _____</para>               </place>             <lines>1.2cm 2.65cm 19.9cm 2.65cm</lines>             <place x="1.3cm" y="0cm" height="2.55cm" width="19.0cm">                 <para style="main_footer">[[ company.rml_footer ]]</para>                 <para style="main_footer">Contact : [[ user.name ]] - Page: <pageNumber/></para>             </place>         </pageGraphics>     </pageTemplate> </header>
